intro.tagline: I like building apps and web pages.
paragraphs: I am a creative full-stack developer who loves challenges, building websites, apps, and user interfaces, solving problems, and coming up with new exciting solutions.

I have always been interested in technology in general and computers in particular, and since the age of seven, I have used a computer almost every day. It was clear early on that computers were my thing and that they would become a major part of my future...

github.heading: How do I spend my time?
